actions.name: all
actions.description: add, commit, and push all changes

actions.name: dfile
actions.description: diff a specific file against HEAD

actions.name: branch
actions.description: get a list of branches; select branch to switch to

actions.name: remove
actions.description: removes/deletes both local and remote branch

actions.name: diff
actions.description: gives you a selectable list of changed files; opens selected file in your difftool specified inside the profile.py file

actions.name: re
actions.description: restores version found in master.  To do this, it switches to your local master branch, does a git pull, switches back to your current branch, and then does a git restore --source master -- filename

actions.name: reback
actions.description: restores version of file from last commit in current branch
